description: '''Luís Filipe Fraga Oliveira''' ({{IPA|pt-PT|luˈiʃ fɨˈlipɨ ˈfɾaɣɐ ɔliˈvɐjɾɐ}}; born 27 May 1983), better known by his stage name '''Lucenzo''' ({{IPA|pt|luˈsẽzu|pron}}), is a Portuguese-French [[reggaeton]] singer, songwriter, rapper and record producer. His parents emigrated to [[France]] from [[Portugal]]. Lucenzo, when began his singing career, signed with the [[Universal Music Group|Universal Music]] record label, to which he is still today. He is best known for his dance hit with rapper [[Big Ali]], "[[Vem Dançar Kuduro|Vem dançar Kuduro]]". [[Puerto Rico|Puerto Rican]] [[reggaeton]] artist [[Don Omar]] released a Spanish/Portuguese version of the song under the title "[[Danza Kuduro]]" with Lucenzo.
